name: Chad Monky and the Quest for the Golden Bananas
name_original: Chad Monky and the Quest for the Golden Bananas
description: Chad Monky has many things. He is a happy monky. However, there is one thing that still bothers him. He doesn't have any golden bananas. This is unacceptable. Therefore, he sets out on a quest through the jungle to gather this rare, delectable treat and once again become the king of the jungle.
